name: Heart of Depth
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Hydro Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Hydro.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

storytext: "For all deaths are in vain. There is no saving those who indulge in the past."
